title: Season 7 Ranked Placements for 2017
body: Hello Summoners, I just wanted to know how Ranked Placements worked. Right now i'm plat III in solo queue. Does it matter on your MMR for you w/l ratio? Thanks!

*Lew* is 100% correct here and I couldn't have said it better myself! To supplement what they provided, I'd also like to mention that we made a post regarding the 2017 ranked season that you can find [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season). ^.^

Your ranked MMR is taken into account along with how well you do in the 2017 placement matches to determine where you end up next season.  Usually players end up several divisions below where they were last season as they do a soft reset of MMR for each season.
